summary: A revamp and upscale of the original to be more consistent with HD armors and textures.
descriptionHtml:
A personal edit.  Perhaps my most favorite item in the game that never got the proper HD love.

New details added along with the old to keep consistent with other high-res armors.  No longer do you look like a walking statue with *gasp* eye holes.

Textures include the base, specular, and new normal map all at 1024x1024.  (original 512)

Just install into the skyrim directory, or use NMM.

Perhaps an \'undamaged\" version in the future.


Updated:
Fixed seams around the back.
author: Marcius
